report.title: CIS Kubernetes Benchmark Compliance Report

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the API server pod specification file permissions are set to 644 or more restrictive
failed_checks_details.remediation: Run the below command (based on the file location on your system) on the control plane node. For example, chmod 644 /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the API server pod specification file ownership is set to root:root
failed_checks_details.remediation: Run the below command (based on the file location on your system) on the control plane node. For example, chown root:root /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false
failed_checks_details.remediation: Edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml on the control plane node and set the below parameter. --anonymous-auth=false

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the --basic-auth-file argument is not set
failed_checks_details.remediation: Follow the documentation and configure alternate mechanisms for authentication. Then, edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml on the control plane node and remove the --basic-auth-file=<filename> parameter.

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the --profiling argument is set to false
failed_checks_details.remediation: Edit the API server pod specification file /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml on the control plane node and set the below parameter. --profiling=false

failed_checks_details.description: Ensure that the kubelet service file permissions are set to 644 or more restrictive
failed_checks_details.remediation: Run the following command to modify the kubelet service file permissions: chmod 644 /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubelet-args.conf

recommendations: Immediate remediation required for authentication-related controls (IDs 1.2.1, 1.2.2)
Review and correct file permissions on control plane nodes
Implement proper RBAC and disable anonymous authentication
Regular security scanning and compliance monitoring
Automate remediation through GitLab CI/CD pipelines
